description: The resource schema to create a CodeArtifact repository.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

RepositoryName.markdownDescription:
The name of the repository.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 2  

Maximum Length: 100  

Pattern: ^([A-Za-z0-9][A-Za-z0-9._\-]{1,99})$  

Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: The name of the repository. This is used for GetAtt
Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the repository. This is used for GetAtt

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 2  

Maximum Length: 100  

Pattern: ^([A-Za-z0-9][A-Za-z0-9._\-]{1,99})$  

Update requires: No interruption

DomainName.description: The name of the domain that contains the repository.
DomainName.markdownDescription:
The name of the domain that contains the repository.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 2  

Maximum Length: 50  

Pattern: ^([a-z][a-z0-9\-]{0,48}[a-z0-9])$  

Update requires: No interruption

DomainOwner.description: The 12-digit account ID of the AWS account that owns the domain.
DomainOwner.markdownDescription:
The 12-digit account ID of the AWS account that owns the domain.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: [0-9]{12}  

Update requires: No interruption

Description.description: A text description of the repository.
Description.markdownDescription:
A text description of the repository.

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 1000   

Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the repository.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 2048   

Update requires: No interruption

ExternalConnections.description: A list of external connections associated with the repository.
ExternalConnections.markdownDescription:
A list of external connections associated with the repository.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

Upstreams.description: A list of upstream repositories associated with the repository.
Upstreams.markdownDescription:
A list of upstream repositories associated with the repository.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

PermissionsPolicyDocument.description: The access control resource policy on the provided repository.
PermissionsPolicyDocument.markdownDescription:
The access control resource policy on the provided repository.

---

Required: No

Type: object  
Minimum Length: 2  

Maximum Length: 5120   

Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
